briefdescription.para: Symbol indicating whether memory configuration through UICR is present.
Symbol indicating whether peripheral configuration through UICR is present.
Symbol indicating whether feature configuration through UICR is present.
Symbol indicating whether mailbox configuration through UICR is present.
Symbol indicating whether VTOR configuration through UICR is present.
Symbol indicating whether extended UICR is present.
Symbol indicating whether GPIO feature is present.
Symbol indicating whether immutable boot region configuration is present.
Symbol indicating whether linking channels of DPPI as either source or sink is configured using the LINK.DIR and LINK.EN registers.
Number of memory blocks.
Number of peripherals.
Number of GPIOs.
Number of GPIOTE channels.
Number of global IPCTs.
Number of local IPCTs.
Number of global DPPIs.
Number of IPCMAPs.
Number of MAILBOXes.
Immutable boot region permissions bitmask.
Memory permissions mask.

simplesect.para: When bit is set, the selected action is not allowed.

briefdescription.para: Feature index mask.

simplesect.para: Ownership of the pin is indicated by bit not set.

briefdescription.para: UICR features.
Read access.
Write access.
Software execute.
Secure-only access.
Immutable boot region permissions mask.

simplesect.para: When bit is set, the selected action is allowed.

briefdescription.para: Function for getting the configuration of the memory block.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Index of the memory block.

simplesect.para: Configuration of the specified memory block.

briefdescription.para: Function for getting the size of the memory block.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Index of the memory block.

simplesect.para: Size of the specified memory block in bytes.

briefdescription.para: Function for getting the configuration of the peripheral.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Index of the peripheral.

briefdescription.para: Function for getting the ownership requests of the feature.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Feature to be accessed.
Index of the feature. Only used for applicable features, otherwise skipped.

simplesect.para: Ownership requests mask of the specified feature.

briefdescription.para: Function for getting the permission requests of the feature.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Feature to be accessed.
Index of the feature. Only used for applicable features, otherwise skipped.

simplesect.para: Permission requests mask of the specified feature.

briefdescription.para: Function for getting the linking requests of the feature.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Feature to be accessed.
Index of the feature. Only used for applicable features, otherwise skipped.

simplesect.para: Linking requests masks for source and sink of the specified feature.

briefdescription.para: Function for getting the configuration of the IPCMAP channel.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Index of the IPCMAP channel.

simplesect.para: Configuration of the specified IPCMAP channel.

briefdescription.para: Function for getting the address of the MAILBOX.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Index of the memory block.

simplesect.para: Start address of the specified MAILBOX.

briefdescription.para: Function for getting the configuration of the MAILBOX.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Index of the MAILBOX.

briefdescription.para: Function for getting the initial value of the secure VTOR (Vector Table Offset Register).

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.

simplesect.para: Initial value of the secure VTOR.

briefdescription.para: Function for getting the initial value of the non-secure VTOR.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.

simplesect.para: Initial value of the non-secure VTOR.

briefdescription.para: Function for getting the pointer to the extended UICR.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.

briefdescription.para: Function for setting the configuration of the immutable boot region.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Pointer to the configuration structure.

briefdescription.para: Function for getting the configuration of the immutable boot region.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Pointer to the structure to be filled with immutable boot region settings.
Configuration is applied.
Register is equal to 0xFFFFFFFF, meaning that configuration is not applied.

briefdescription.para: Function for getting the GPIO instance address associated with the specified GPIO entry.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Index of GPIO entry.

briefdescription.para: Function for getting the CTRLSEL configuration associated with the specified GPIO pin.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Absolute pin number.
